content: this simple summer top knitting pattern is a quick and easy knit with minimal seaming required in fact if you choose to use the straps as ties and wear this top as a halter top by tying them around your neck then there is absolutely no seaming required at all **materials ** -1-2 skeins knit picks brava worsted weight yarn amount required will vary by size and length of bodice colours in photos are white & avocado -us size 8 5 0 mm circular knitting needles 16 cord -stitch markers -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends -crochet hook to chain straps **sizes ** xs s m l xl 2xl ﻿**skill level ** ﻿intermediate
